com.star.reportng
类 HTMLReporter

java.lang.Object
  com.star.reportng.AbstractReporter
      com.star.reportng.HTMLReporter
所有已实现的接口：
org.testng.IReporter, org.testng.ITestNGListener
public class HTMLReporter
extends AbstractReporter

Enhanced HTML reporter for TestNG that uses Velocity templates to generate its output.

作者：
Daniel Dyer

方法详细信息

generateReport

public void generateReport(java.util.List<org.testng.xml.XmlSuite> xmlSuites,
                           java.util.List<org.testng.ISuite> suites,
                           java.lang.String outputDirectoryName)
Generates a set of HTML files that contain data about the outcome of the specified test suites.

参数：
suites - Data about the test runs.
outputDirectoryName - The directory in which to create the report.

sortGroups

private java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.util.SortedSet<org.testng.ITestNGMethod>> sortGroups(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<org.testng.ITestNGMethod>> groups)
Sorts groups alphabetically and also sorts methods within groups alphabetically (class name first, then method name). Also eliminates duplicate entries.

copyResources

private void copyResources(java.io.File outputDirectory)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Reads the CSS and JavaScript files from the JAR file and writes them to the output directory.

参数：
outputDirectory - Where to put the resources.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - If the resources can't be read or written.
